entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Periods of light snow beginning late this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
